scripts.copy-dependencies: npm run copy-dompurify && npm run copy-marked && npm run copy-tailwindcss && npm run copy-pdfjs
scripts.copy-dompurify: npm run copy-dompurify-web && npm run copy-dompurify-aspire-web
scripts.copy-dompurify-web: npm run copy-dependency -- --name dompurify --dest-root chatWeb --src-root dist --files purify.es.mjs
scripts.copy-dompurify-aspire-web: npm run copy-dependency -- --name dompurify --dest-root chatAspireWeb --src-root dist --files purify.es.mjs
scripts.copy-marked: npm run copy-marked-web && npm run copy-marked-aspire-web
scripts.copy-marked-web: npm run copy-dependency -- --name marked --dest-root chatWeb --src-root lib --files marked.esm.js
scripts.copy-marked-aspire-web: npm run copy-dependency -- --name marked --dest-root chatAspireWeb --src-root lib --files marked.esm.js
scripts.copy-tailwindcss: npm run copy-tailwindcss-web && npm run copy-tailwindcss-aspire-web
scripts.copy-tailwindcss-web: npm run copy-dependency -- --name tailwindcss --dest-root chatWeb --files preflight.css
scripts.copy-tailwindcss-aspire-web: npm run copy-dependency -- --name tailwindcss --dest-root chatAspireWeb --files preflight.css
scripts.copy-pdfjs: npm run copy-pdfjs-web && npm run copy-pdfjs-aspire-web
